subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych defeated Carlos Berlocq in three sets to give the Czech Republic a spot in the Davis Cup final and a chance to avenge a loss to Spain in the 2009 final.
snippet: Tomas Berdych defeated Carlos Berlocq in three sets to give the Czech Republic a spot in the Davis Cup final and a chance to avenge a loss to Spain in the 2009 final.
